thread.title: John & Penny Yoder
thread.title_full: ClearBags reviewed by John & Penny Yoder

author: John & Penny Yoder
title: John & Penny Yoder
text: Great products and always up to my expectations. I've been ordering for a few years, now. On my last order, I wasn't sure of a certain size. I called Clear Bags and the representative suggested that she should send me a couple of samples to be sure. They arrived and one of them was exactly what I needed. I was very pleased and appreciative of her help.
